entries.name: Magic Mischief
entries: Once per long rest, you can use a bonus action to grant one of the following effects: give advantage to the next ally spell attack made within 1 minute; impose disadvantage on the next enemy spell attack targeting your party within 1 minute; or change the damage type of your next successful spell attack.

entries.name: Yordle Ears
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
